articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: 9 hats from Royal Ascot 2023 dazzle with over-the-top, gravity-defying flair - OregonLive
articles.description: This year's standouts included a giant sunflower, several feathered numbers, and an “Alice in Wonderland”-themed hat with playing cards, a clock and a ribbon that read “We're all mad here."
articles.content: Every summer, British royals and thousands of others get dressed to the nines for Royal Ascot, a glamorous annual horse racing event that dates back to 1711, when Queen Anne founded Ascot Racecourse … [+3101 chars]
